div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا كتاب براه من صيفي بن
سالم عامل الأمير أبي غالب
بن الإصبهبذ أعز اللّه نصره على مدر ورزم
لمير بن بك إنّي قبضت منك
ممّا صار عليك من قسمة نفقات الأرض
ونفقات دواب البريد وقسمة نفقات
الأرض وجوائز البرد والرّسل ونزلهم
الّتي تجري مع خراج سنة سبع وأربعين ومئة
خمسة عشر درهم وخمسة دونيق
منها من قسمة نفقات الأرض ونفقات
دواب البريد اثنا عشر درهما وثلثة دونيق
ومن قسمة نفقات الأرض وجوائز البرد
الرسل ونزلهم الّتي تجري مع خراج سنة
سبع وأربعين ومئة
ثلثة دراهم ودانقين
قبضت ذلك منك
وبرئت إلي منها وكتب

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā kitābu barāʾaẗ:in min ṣayfiyyi bni
sālim:in ʿāmili ăl ʾamīri ʾabī ġālibi
bni ăl ʾiṣbahbaḏi ʾaʿazza ăl lāhu naṣra hu ʿalà madra wa rizma
li mīri bni baka ʾinn ī qabaḍtu min ka
mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka min qismaẗi nafaqāti ăl ʾarḍi
wa nafaqāti dawābbi ăl barīdi wa qismaẗi nafaqāti
ăl ʾarḍi wa ǧawāʾizi ăl burudi wa ăr rusuli wa nuzuli himi
ăllatī taǧrī maʿa ḫarāǧi sanaẗi sabʿ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
ḫamsaẗa ʿašara dirham wa ḫamsaẗa dawānīqa
min hā min qismaẗi nafaqāti ăl ʾarḍi wa nafaqāti
dawābbi ăl barīdi ĭṯnā ʿašara dirham:an wa ṯalāṯaẗa dawānīqa
wa min qismaẗi nafaqāti ăl ʾarḍi wa ǧawāʾizi ăl burudi
wa ăr rusuli wa nuzuli himi ăllatī taǧrī maʿa ḫarāǧi sanaẗi
sabʿ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
ṯalāṯaẗa darāhima wa dānaqayni
qabaḍtu ḏālika min ka
wa bariʾta ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba
***

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a document of quittance from Ṣayfī ibn
Sālim, the financial administrator of the governor ʾAbū Ġālib
ibn al-ʾIṣbahbadh, may God strengthen his victory, (whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm,
for Mīr ibn Bēk. I have received from you
what you owe with regard to the portion of the expenses of the land and
the expenses of the pack-animals of the couriers and the portion of the expenses
of the land and the travel provisions for the couriers and messengers and their board
that is administrered together with the kharāj of the year one hundred and forty-seven,
fifteen dirhams and five dānaqs,
of these for the portion of the expenses of the land and the expenses
of the pack-animals of the postal service twelve dirhams and three dānaqs
and for the portion of the land and the travel provisions for the couriers and
messengers and their board that is administered together with the kharāj of the year
one hundred and forty-seven
three dirhams and two dānaqs.
I have received that from you
and you have been released from (the obligations to pay them) to me. It has been written.
